3.0 RC2 (I2004-06-11-1814

I have two windows open: The first window shows the java browsing perspective
and has the java perspective open as the only other perspective. Only one
perspective button is visible in the upper right hand corner.
The second window has three perspectives: (in order) Java, Search Perspective (a
customized resource perspective with only a search results view) and a resource
perspective.

When in the first window, I switch from the Java Browsing perspective to the
java perspective, I get the following exception:
